title: 43. Talking decor, trends and design with Sarah from She Holds Dearly
description:
I loved this interview with my friend Sarah from She Holds Dearly. We talk trends, design and why decor matters. We even talked specifically about my living room that is in need of a makeover! 

Follow along with She Holds Dearly:

Instagram

Youtube

Blog

Grab my free Ebook 'Simple Ways to Add Farmhouse Style' HERE.

Get my free 10 day course on how to start a blog HERE.

Thanks again for listening and I'll see you in the next episode of the Simple Farmhouse Life podcast!
